thread.title: Clema van Rijn
thread.title_full: Homestay.com reviewed by Clema van Rijn

author: Clema van Rijn
title: Clema van Rijn
text:
January 2017 we stay in the guest house Odalys We had an excellent stay.
The guest house is conveniently located in Havana. Within walking distance of the beautiful old town.
The care was fine good breakfast and good beds.
The landlady and her family were extremely friendly helpful people, it is definitely worth it to stay here. We have already recommand our friends to visit this place. Clema en Fred van Rijn The Netherlands
